properties.areaDesc: Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge; The Little Rockies
properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 3 at 2:12AM MST until March 3 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow MT
properties.description:
* AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 135, 136 and 137.

* TIMING...Noon to 6 PM MST Tuesday.

* WINDS...Northwest 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph.

* RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent.

* TEMPERATURES...In the upper 40s.

* IMPACTS...This combination of extreme winds and RH values near
20 percent along with limited recent moisture will allow any
fire that starts to spread rapidly.
properties.instruction:
Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these
areas of this Red Flag Warning.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR THE COMBINATION OF HIGH WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 135, 136 AND 137
